parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the container cluster.

> You can call the [DescribeGroupedContainerInstances](~~DescribeGroupedContainerInstances~~) operation to query the IDs of container clusters.

parameters.name: ContainerFieldName
parameters.description:
The name of the field that is used to search for the container. Valid values:

*   **CONTAINER_ID**: the ID of the container
*   **IMAGE**: the name of the image
*   **NAMESPACE**: the namespace
*   **NODE_NAME**: the name of the node
*   **POD_IP**: the IP address of the pod
*   **HOST_IP**: the IP address of the host
*   **INSTANCE_ID**: the ID of the instance

parameters.name: ContainerFieldValue
parameters.description: The value of the field that is used to search for the container.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the asset group.

> You can call the [DescribeAllGroups](~~130972~~) operation to query the IDs of asset groups.

parameters.name: HaveRisk
parameters.description:
Specifies whether risks were detected. Valid values:

*   **1**: yes
*   **0**: no

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: MachineName
parameters.description: The name of the server on which the baseline check is performed.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: **10**, which indicates that 10 entries of server information are displayed on each page. A maximum of 100 entries can be returned per page.

parameters.name: RiskId
parameters.description:
The ID of the risk item.

> You can call the [DescribeCheckWarningSummary](~~DescribeCheckWarningSummary~~) operation to query the IDs of risk items.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.

parameters.name: StrategyId
parameters.description: The ID of the baseline check policy.

parameters.name: TargetType
parameters.description:
The type of the query condition. Valid values:

*   **containerId**: the ID of the container
*   **uuid**: the UUID of the asset

parameters.name: Uuids
parameters.description: The UUID of the server on which the baseline check is performed. Separate multiple UUIDs with commas (,).
